name: Edalock
description:
Edalock is my first game. I hope you enjoy it. You should check the Credits out!

Controls:

Walk: WASD, arrow-keys

jump: w, up-key, space

switch: f, c, y, z

Soundtrack: https://opengameart.org/content/waves-0
